name: dodgeit-tiny
description:
Dodgeit-tiny - This is my TweetTweetJam entry. I am at 597 characters from doing a control A and paste... then counting. Just barely made it.

Use the left and right arrow to dodge back and forth and try to make it as far as you can. The score appears at the end with a unhappy face.

You have to reset the cart to run it again... I ran out of room to make a menu or reset.
